panels.brickConf: {"brick":"chart-v2.gauge-chart","properties":{"height":150,"data":[{"item":"CPU使用率"}],"yField":"percent","gaugeTitle":"CPU使用率","thresholdColors":[{"value":50,"color":"#0086FA"},{"value":90,"color":"#FFBF00"},{"value":100,"color":"#F5222D"}],"axis":{"yAxis":{"min":0,"max":100,"unit":"%","precision":0}}},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-select","args":[{"model":"easyops.HOST","statements":[{"name":"host_cpu_used_total","alias":"host_cpu_used_total"},{"name":"time"}],"filters":[{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"now-5m"},{"name":"host_cpu_used_total","operator":"!=","value":null},{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${query.instanceId|string}"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}],"limit":{"limit":1}}],"transform":{"data[0].percent":"<% _.get(DATA.list, \"[0][\\\"host_cpu_used_total\\\"]\") %>"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
panels.title: CPU使用率

panels.brickConf: {"brick":"chart-v2.gauge-chart","properties":{"height":150,"data":[{"item":"内存使用率"}],"yField":"percent","gaugeTitle":"内存使用率","thresholdColors":[{"value":50,"color":"#0086FA"},{"value":90,"color":"#FFBF00"},{"value":100,"color":"#F5222D"}],"axis":{"yAxis":{"min":0,"max":100,"unit":"%","precision":2}}},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-select","args":[{"model":"easyops.HOST","statements":[{"name":"host_mem_percent","alias":"host_mem_percent"},{"name":"time"}],"filters":[{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"now-5m"},{"name":"host_mem_percent","operator":"!=","value":null},{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${query.instanceId|string}"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}],"limit":{"limit":1}}],"transform":{"data[0].percent":"<% _.get(DATA.list, \"[0][\\\"host_mem_percent\\\"]\") %>"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
panels.title: 内存使用率

panels.brickConf: {"brick":"chart-v2.gauge-chart","properties":{"height":150,"data":[{"item":"最大磁盘使用率"}],"yField":"percent","gaugeTitle":"最大磁盘使用率","thresholdColors":[{"value":50,"color":"#0086FA"},{"value":90,"color":"#FFBF00"},{"value":100,"color":"#F5222D"}],"axis":{"yAxis":{"min":0,"max":100,"unit":"%","precision":2}}},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-select","args":[{"model":"easyops.HOST","statements":[{"name":"host_disk_max_used_percent","alias":"host_disk_max_used_percent"},{"name":"time"}],"filters":[{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"now-5m"},{"name":"host_disk_max_used_percent","operator":"!=","value":null},{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${query.instanceId|string}"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}],"limit":{"limit":1}}],"transform":{"data[0].percent":"<% _.get(DATA.list, \"[0][\\\"host_disk_max_used_percent\\\"]\") %>"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}

panels.brickConf: {"brick":"chart-v2.time-series-chart","properties":{"height":230,"xField":"time","yFields":["host_load_1","host_load_5","host_load_15"]},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-query","args":[{"model":"easyops.HOST","dims":["time(1m)"],"measures":[{"name":"host_load_1","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["host_load_1"]}},{"name":"host_load_5","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["host_load_5"]}},{"name":"host_load_15","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["host_load_15"]}}],"filters":[{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${query.instanceId}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"${query.from=\"now-1h\"|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":"<=","value":"<% parseInt(+moment() / 1000) %>"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}]}],"transform":{"data":"<% DATA.list %>"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
